founders.name: Aryan Raj
founders.fullBio: Aryan is a passionate product builder and AI enthusiast. He has been a finalist at IIT Bombay E-Summit and won HIT-A-Thon for his innovative thinking. He leads BullBear AI’s product direction with a focus on intuitive design and impactful functionality.

founders.name: Abhishek Kumar
founders.shortBio: Full-stack developer passionate about building scalable AI products
founders.fullBio: Abhishek is a full-stack developer and co-founder at BullBear AI, driving the platform’s technical backbone. With deep knowledge in the MERN stack, system design, and scalable architecture, he’s known for converting complex problems into practical solutions. He’s also a winner of Inno-v-sion and IIT Bhilai Hackathon, showcasing his problem-solving edge.

founders.name: Abhiraj Adhikary
founders.fullBio: Abhiraj is a backend and data enthusiast aiming to become a skilled data engineer. He brings curiosity, consistency, and a growing passion for scalable data solutions to the BullBear AI team.

founders.name: Anik Chand
founders.fullBio: Anik is an aspiring machine learning engineer with a strong foundation in AI concepts and development. At BullBear AI, he’s focused on applying ML solutions to improve prediction accuracy and model performance.
